website_summaries.verdict: Popular ginger beer that blends gingers from Nigeria, Cochin (India), and the Ivory Coast.
pros: Blend of 3 gingers from Nigeria, Cochin (India), and the Ivory Coast, product has won awards for taste and quality
This ginger beer boasts a fresh ginger taste, clean and refreshing without being overly sweet
Has a smooth texture created by less intense carbonation and high-quality ingredients
cons: The beverage is very popular, but there were complaints about the high price

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY striking ginger hit.
customer_reviews.text: If you're hoping for something like a sweet gingerale, this isn't it. This is more like taking lightly sweetened water and adding literal fresh ginger juice to it; there's a vivid striking, lasting burn. If you aren't a ginger or ginger beer gourmand, try to find a way to sample this before commit yourself to a full case.
customer_reviews.author: Inquisitor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance, quality ginger taste
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic migraines. With that, comes frequent nausea and vomitting. I have tried many brands of ginger beer and this brand is the only one that has provided me with true relief from my symptoms. i drink a bottle straight over ice. It has a crisp ginger bite, not too strong, but bold enough to taste the quality. A little heat sticks on the tonge after each swallow. For my taste, the sweetness is just right. Not like a soft drink, more of a perfect counter to the ginger bite. I use this product as a kind of medicine but it has a taste and qualities that make it enjoyable anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box we discovered that a bottle had been broken. This must have happened a while ago because the contents was dry. However, dried residual Ginger Beer covered the remaining bottles necessitating that they be washed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B Underwood

customer_reviews.title: Label Change?
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this for a while and love the light refreshing taste but I noticed the last batch I purchased had a change in labeling. Instead of " naturally light" it says "refreshingly light" Instead of " made with natural gingers", it says made with natural flavors; also the previous ones were labeled " all natural" and the last batch is not. What is going on? Has some change been made?
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: PROS AND CONS
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. The packaging was phenomenal, and everything went on my compost pile except for a wee bit of plastic. 2. The flavor reminds me of the ginger ale Uncle VERN introduced me to in Michigan ORS, it may have a bit more of a bite, which is okay by me. 3. I also love that the container is glass. Beverages seem to hold their flavors better and seem colder when in glass bottles. In fact, the bottles are so pretty, I am trying to figure out how to upcycle them into something useful. CONS: 1. The price. 2. A non-twist cap, which makes it more difficult to upcycle the bottles.
customer_reviews.author: GHI

customer_reviews.title: Nothing comes close to this #1
customer_reviews.text: Fever Tree Ginger Beer is by far my favorite to use when making cocktails after being told about it by my SO. The ginger beer as a mixer is not too sweet or overpowering in your drink, making for a great flavor combination with whatever you mix. The ginger flavor is excellent, even on its own this tastes high quality. The ginger beer is the right amount of fizzy and doesn't bubble up causing your glass to overflow, either. I've been using Fever Tree almost exclusively to make Moscow mules and other grocery store ginger beers don't even come close to this one. The bottles also have a twist top, but I don't think you'll be leaving any behind!
customer_reviews.author: RobPlease

customer_reviews.title: Gouging much?
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty decent product, but can somebody explain to me why it went from 27.59 for a 24-pack, up to 45.25 in the span of a month?
customer_reviews.author: David Boggs

customer_reviews.title: BEST Ginger Beer! 🥇
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ginger beer for nausea. As someone who suffers from chronic nausea, I've tried quite a wide variety. I prefer this one because it's got a bit less sugar than most of them, the acidity is milder, there aren't any gross artificial colorings or flavors, the carbonation level is just right, and most importantly, that spicy and refreshing ginger heat comes through STRONG. I love it! -And this is the best deal I've found on it, aside from maybe Costco (which sells it in a box by the dozen in larger screw-top bottles). Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Noreen

customer_reviews.title: What to do if you have tuition payments due and you need money
customer_reviews.text: From 19.28 last month, to 30.83 this month, really??!! I know gasoline fluctuates in price, but ginger beer too? Thx but no thx
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent flavor
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased a bottle of 'ginger beer concentrate' from a different company but was unsatisfied with the flavor. I had been enjoying Fever-Tree tonic water so I decided to try their bottled Ginger Beer. I just received my order and, eager to compare flavor, I took a little sip. Immediately upon opening the bottle I could smell the wonderful ginger beer flavor and I wasn't disappointed with the sip. It's only 9 am but I'll eagerly finish the bottle later today. At nearly $4/bottle including tax, it's not cheap... but it is what you're likely seeking in a good Ginger Beer. I do recommend getting the 'Premium' version.
customer_reviews.author: Laura in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Received tonic water instead of Ginger Beer twice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It is great straight or as a mixer for cocktails. Unfortunately I received tonic water instead of ginger beer, twice. Once one the original order and on the replacement order as well. My one star is really more for Amazon and not the product.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: As mild as any grocery store ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: I have never been so disappointed in a soda. I was promised next-level heat, with a price to match. I could not tell the difference between this soda and trader joe's ginger beer, which is a next level indictment. If you want hot ginger beer, I'd recommend cock n' bull, or even Reed's extra ginger ginger beer. This stuff should be relabeled ginger ale.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Boone

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Just Wow.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of Ginger Beers. I've never quite been happy with the flavor of other brands or types. Some are mixed with weird juice choices or spices, and just didn't have that clean, snappy ginger taste I was after. Fever-Tree Premium Ginger Beer is definitely among the top I've ever had. It's silky smooth with the satisfying ginger kick at the end, perfect for drinking slow sips to sooth an upset stomach or to make an excellent Moscow Mule. This is my new go-to Ginger Beer of choice.
customer_reviews.author: Catheren

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest, most gingery brand I've tried - makes a perfect Moscow mule
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting most gingery ginger beer I have ever tried. There is one other brand that comes close for less money but this one tastes great and makes you feel fancy. The ginger taste is quite spicy it is not like ginger ale (nor should it be) so if that's what you're looking for this is your product! It is non-alcoholic and gluten-free. I have celiac disease and have no problem with with consuming this in my Moscow mules on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Corby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic ginger for Moscow Mule
customer_reviews.text: While the US still drinks Aperol Pritz, in Europe the Moscow Mule, invented by a famous vodka brand, is THE fashion cocktail. The UK Fever Tree is the must to make this refreshing drink. Not too sweet as other competitors this product has a nice and clean packaging and comes in different bottle sizes. Taste is of ginger, but not that stron I personally prefer this format to avoid waste as I drink with moderation. It is perfect for one copper mug. Of course, it would be great if the price came down, but to be honest it 8s not bad for an inported product...so guess which drink are we going to drink Friday!
customer_reviews.author: VeroTop Contributor: Drawing

customer_reviews.title: A great taste
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite Ginger Beer for making mules or just for drinking. It doesn't have all the "bad stuff" like regular sodas and it tastes great. I love the ginger spiciness. And it's not too bad with sugar and carbs (as compared to other sodas)
customer_reviews.author: mojo

customer_reviews.title: No only a mixer
customer_reviews.text: I have never used this with alcohol I drink my alcohol straight LOL! That said I get two cases of Firetree Ginger Beer delivered every month. It perfect when you want a soda but not a ton of calories and other junk in your drink. It more expensive but if I have soda I drink more so it work out to be just a little more expensive and a lot less calories. I love the taste and it kill the soda craving. It very refreshing on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It certainly has a very strong ginger flavor.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first taste of ginger beer. It certainly has a very strong ginger flavor. Drinking it as a stand alone beverage must be an acquired taste. For now, I am very happy using it as a mixer to make fantastic, non-alcoholic, Moscow Mules. I have watched the price for this product fluctuate from $19 to $31 dollars. Obviously you know when to make a move. I recommend this product and I am going to purchase it again when the time is right.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: addictively good.
customer_reviews.text: I love a great tasting ginger beer. Most of the major brands leaves me cold and flat. THIS IS THE REAL DEAL!! No alcohol!! So don't get confused. So my drink is 100% mixer (the ginger beer) not the 75% recommended inside the four pak sleeve. The other 25% would normally be liquor of sort. Anyway, 200ml (6.8fl oz) is all one needs to satisfy your thirst. love it so much got the big bottle too. And reorder this size as well. Keep on reordering. Life is short so drink the best and not settle for something less.
customer_reviews.author: readalot

customer_reviews.title: Small but bold
customer_reviews.text: There are smaller than expect but perfect in every other way. I suffer from migraines and need Canada Dry around at all times. This taste like Canada Dry bold but without the high fructose corn syrup. I love the ginger kick it has and the cute bottle. The details of the package are very elegant. It’s very small so I probably have to drink two at the first sign of a migraine. For that reason alone, I give it 4.5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: TruthBtold

customer_reviews.title: All bark; no bite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this brand before it definitely has an upscale taste but it’s also definitely quite bland I prefer a bit of a bite. The fact that it is a premium drink is demonstrated by the price but again I was disappointed because I prefer spicy like “Q” ginger beer. It’s probably good for a recipe that calls for ginger beer because of the lack of spice however... ~LuvUMuch Neciaism
customer_reviews.author: Neciaism

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Fever-Tree Ginger Beer is the best ginger beer available anywhere for mixed drinks. I make a lot of mule drinks (liquor, lime, and ginger beer) and find that this one is the perfect balance of ginger, spicy heat and sweetness. It's less sweet than some other popular brands, has better tiny bubble fizz, and gives the perfect amount of ginger bite. It's a bit more expensive than other brands and hard to find locally in my area, but I have it on Amazon subscription which brings the cost down a bit and keeps in always supplied. But honestly, I'd rather not drink a ginger beer than compromise on a lesser brand that I can find cheaper at the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Moby

customer_reviews.title: Best ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: Fever Tree ginger beer is my cocktail alternative. It’s flavorful and quite spicy, and not at all like a sweet kids drink version, or lacking in full flavor like some of the other mixer company versions, so it works well as a sippable not alcoholic beverage, or a very flavorful mixer for mocktails/cocktails. The case on Amazon saves me a few dollars over buying individual 4 packs at the grocery or liquor store. Will definitely reorder when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Yummy. Strong flavor the way I like it.
customer_reviews.text: It's not your water down ginger ale or some of the funky tasting ginger beer. This has that biting ginger taste without any odd flavor added. It's clean ginger taste. Yummy. I'm hooked. And it doesn't use High Fructose Corn Syrup or any artificial flavoring or sweetener. Bit pricier than some of the other premium ginger beer. but I like this better. So why spend money on something inferior even though it may still be premium quality?
customer_reviews.author: readalot

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flavor
customer_reviews.text: Over the past few years I have tried 3 other brands and Fever-Tree Ginger Beer is by far the best. I enjoy it as a chilled glass in the late summer afternoon. Glad I took note of the great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is really very good. But my favorite ginger beer remains Summit Ginger Beer which I discovered at Aldi's and find is only sold, as far as I can find, also only at Aldi's. I also recognize that Fever-Tree is sold more as mixer than as a refreshing drink, which it definitely is, on its own. So will consume for now until I can find another source for Summit. (Aldi's is out of stock as Summit's is out of season for some reason.)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine M. Hinkel

customer_reviews.title: Superstrong taste!
customer_reviews.text: This ginger beer may be too strong for some people but this is the original strong taste I've been looking for! Great for mixing and boosting your immune system as well! It's not the cheapest but most importantly the best!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jitka Kacerova

customer_reviews.title: cute little bottles we really wanted to like it, but is more like a tonic than ...
customer_reviews.text: cute little bottles we really wanted to like it, but is more like a tonic than Ginger Beer....didn't like it at all.....we buy ginger beer all the time and love it but this is not good ginger beer, it is fizzy like tonic water and not at all like Ginger Beer and we didn't like it at all.....so sorry! I wanted to return it, but there is no reason for just not liking the taste of it, so I'm stuck with spending this kind of bucks for something that isn't good at all. Sorry, so dissappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda J. Andress

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Different Than Before
customer_reviews.text: Has Fever Tree changed their recipe?? I don’t know what it was but the last shipment I received did not taste the same. Seemed like it was not as spicy and a little sweeter. Definitely a bummer, Fever Tree was my go-to. I guess for this review to be useful to others, if you like a little kick but not too much in your finger beer, this is always a solid option, but just not for me. I like an incredibly spicy ginger beer and the last bottles i got just missed the mark.
customer_reviews.author: TheBigOak

customer_reviews.title: Goes great with Jagermeister
customer_reviews.text: I got a promotional pack at the liquor store, Jägermeister with a copper tumbler and a bottle of Fever-Tree ginger beer, I really liked the pairing so I went ahead and bought the 8 pack of ginger beer. It's roughly 1 part (1 shot) Jager and 3 parts ginger beer over ice.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: The best ginger beer around!
customer_reviews.text: Fever Tree is my all time favorite brand for ginger beer. It's got a spicy kick from the ginger and doesn't run too sweet compared to other brands. I personally prefer this over Q, Bundaberg (much sweeter), Trader Joe's Ginger Beer, Virgils, and other various brands. I've found the carbonation, taste, and sweetness to be an incredible balance, making it a great accompaniment to any cocktail requiring ginger beer.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the flavor of the fever tree light ginger beer in my moscow mule and packaging if the product has always been great in the past. However, I opened a soggy box and got a small piece of glass in my finger this time. One of the glasses had shattered during shipment. Hoping this is a one time thing.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Best bubbly ginger beverage I have tried so far. Even better that Bruce Cost Ginger Ale, though I did get the canned version of that brand and not bottles. Anyways, I can't see anyone being disappointed with this product. Also, neither this one nor the Bruce Cost beverage tasted too hot/spicy for me. I have read reviews that rank the Bruce Cost as very hot but that is not my impression of either.
customer_reviews.author: Elitestore

customer_reviews.title: Best Moscow Mule I Made
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good quality ginger beer made from natural ingredients, and this is it. Their ginger beer is the best I had. Though, don't order too many at once unless you have a party. I ordered six and a month later, the remaining bottles lost most of their carbonation. Also, make sure that there is someone to pick the order up once it arrives. That way, it won't stay out in the warm weather and lose its quality.
customer_reviews.author: Khaled Alfayez

customer_reviews.title: Strong Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the strongest tasting Ginger Beer I've ever had. I don't think I could drink it straight lol I bought it to make Moscow Mules though, so I just cut it with some Pelligrino to lessen the flavor. Too strong for us straight but if you love the flavor then this would be a good one for you.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, good price, good job delivering it
customer_reviews.text: I meant to order their delicious light tonic water, but pushed the wrong button and got light ginger beer. However, it was a great mistake, this ginger beer is great, makes awesome Mules of all kinds, very refreshing even by itself, snappy, light, naturally lo in calories, Hearty thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: S. Buckley

customer_reviews.title: 5 star handling
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this non- alcoholic ginger beer! We were a little concerned about ordering glass bottles, but they came very well packaged (with thick cardboard dividers and top and bottom lids). Since it's cold outside, some of the bottles did freeze but not enough to crack the glass. The fizz or taste were not impacted by this. All in all, very pleased with this order!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best ginger beer on this planet.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not being hyperbolic when I say that this is my favorite drink in the world. Currently getting quotes to replace my water supply with this so that I can easily replace all of my tap water with this light ginger beer. I look forward to showering in this ginger beer. If you think the regular fever-tree ginger beer is just a little too sweet, please buy this yesterday.
customer_reviews.author: K. Darling

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment compared to regular Fever-Tree
customer_reviews.text: The "natural" sweeteners used in this version of Fever-Tree Ginger Beer give it a fruity off-taste and less of the satisfying biting ginger quality of the regulation Fever-Tree brew. Still much better than the usual ginger ale on the market but an overall disappointment. I'll just drink less of the original stuff to save calories.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo St. DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Quality consumption.
customer_reviews.text: It's about time you restocked, Amazon. My favorite drink ever. I don't even bother mixing in alcohol, it's perfect as it is. But yes, it goes perfectly with gin or vodka or tequila as well. This is a science FeverTree has gotten down to perfection. I deducted Value for Money points cuz of the "estimated tax" Amazon charges you, which makes you not really save money on this deal, making it almost the same price as just going to your local winery and just buying six 4-packs of this.
customer_reviews.author: Sunforce

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY POOR PACKAGING/DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: This product is great however the packaging for glass is beyond poor. The product used to be protected on all sides, top and bottom by honeycomb cardboard. This had nothing on the bottom or sides to protect GLASS bottles. Thus when it was put down hard on a concrete porch (another item was on top thus making it very heavy) several GLASS bottles were broken.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This brand tastes just like ginger.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like ginger beers until I've had this one. This brand is very ginger-y as opposed to other brands where it is more carbonated-soda. Great as a mixer and also as a stand alone drink. I love that the package was carefully handled and shipped.
customer_reviews.author: WinV

customer_reviews.title: Really spicy!
customer_reviews.text: This is very concentrated, very close to "real" non-alcoholic ginger beer. The first sniff or sip sometimes causes you to cough in reaction to the strength. Fantastic alone as a virgin cocktail, or with your spirit of choice. Definitely our go-to mixer!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen S.

customer_reviews.title: Light ginger beer is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: The Fever-Tree Light Ginger beer is my favorite. It has great taste because it uses natural ingredients. Real sugar cane sugar, not corn syrup as the other brands. The light version has less sugar than the regular and to my taste buds the perfect amount. Outstanding!
customer_reviews.author: dash-o

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, not too sweet ginger beer, BUT.
customer_reviews.text: Love this ginger beer and have been ordering it since the Stay At Home started. I've ordered it seven times by the case and paid $29.68 each time. I was ready to order again and suddenly its $46.60 for a case!!!!! I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Authentic flavor with a delicious gingery bite!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! This is one of the most authentic-tasting ginger beverages I have ever enjoyed. Some of the other name-brand "ginger ales" or "ginger beers" have very little REAL ginger flavor, and are mostly just sugar water with VERY little flavor and/or color. NOT Fever-Tree! Through and through this tastes like ginger and even has that "bite" on the tongue that you get when you have real ginger. I had it for the first time on a recent trip to the UK and promptly ordered a bunch when I returned home, because now Canada Dry or Schweppes seem just sad by comparison. If you want real ginger flavor, buy this Fever-Tree ginger beer. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Allmann

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but artisnal-quality beverage
customer_reviews.text: Really tart, vivid, almost burn-y ginger flavor. Actually stimulates the lips when you drink from a glass. An excellent artisnal-quality beverage. Not cheap--no, downright expensive. Buying in bulk is a lot cheaper per unit than buying in grocery store 4-packs, but still way more than the competition. A classic you-get-what-you-pay-for product. In a completely different league from Goslings. If you appreciate free-range chicken or local-farm fennel, this is the ginger beer for you. I use these for craft cocktails and have with Fever Tree found my brand for this purpose. Small bottles work for me -- I make just a drink or two with a bottle. But it may be a problem for others who expect a full 12-ounce serving.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Best ginger beer out in the market
customer_reviews.text: Best ginger beer out in the market. Excellent quality. Price appropriate. Comes in small size bottles: approx. 2 Moscow mules per bottle which is perfect and eliminates waste. Most other merchants/bottles are 16 oz. which often leads to waste if you do not plan to prepare more than 2 drinks per week. After 1 week, ginger beer tends to lose its quality flavor. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. Contreras

customer_reviews.title: I love them. A very nice and "warm" spicy kick ...
customer_reviews.text: I kind of wish I never ordered these because now I am addicted. I love them. A very nice and "warm" spicy kick along with that amazing ginger flavor. Maybe a just a tad bit sweet for my taste, I wouldn't mind about 1/3 less sugar. Pretty on point otherwise. On another note, I like to drink alcoholic beverages at night to kind of spice up the evening and find these to be a good replacement (trying to cut down). Overall, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: arizonahd

customer_reviews.title: Like not love!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love this beverage because it's from, you know, England, and they sponsored a tennis tournament. It has cachet, almost expected to read "by appointment to her royal majesty .." on the label. It's good and interesting, but so sweet. Cloying aftertaste. Was hoping for the refreshing bite of ginger without the soda pop. Add a little real ginger, take out half the sugar and the Queen and I will toast your health.
customer_reviews.author: bobsyouruncle

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beverage with a real kick!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ginger beer I've ever tasted. No wonder it has such a great reputation. Only one little thing I should mention - one of the bottles was broken, shattered, at the bottom of the shipment box, with a soggy bottom of the box where the liquid had run out. Odd because their packaging is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Booth

customer_reviews.title: Absolute BEST on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE the pure ginger flavor! This brand far exceeds any other ginger beer I've ever had. I see they advertise it as a MIXER for alcohol drinks. I actually use it for nausea. I get terrible migraines and the nausea that comes with it sometimes lasts for days. This is the only beverage that nips that nausea in the butt, literally! I'd recommend this for chemo patients as well. So much more than just a mixer with a strong, pleasent flavor/taste. I'm sure I will be a repeat customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hey Jude

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get enough of this stuff; I love it. It is strong, which is what I like. And it is pure. And I like that it comes in glass bottles. I usually drink it by itself, sometimes I add bitters, and sometimes I use it as a mixer with vodka and other beverages. The only drawback - it’s expensive. But, for me, it’s worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: iliketobuythings

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal check expiration dates
customer_reviews.text: Problem is they are selling older soda. I just received 16 bottles on dec 19th and the expiration date is Jan 1 2019 BAD DEAL
customer_reviews.author: E. Katz

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great but received a broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product and tastes great , have been ordering this from Amazon for a couple of years now however this was the first time I received one with a broken bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I'm addicted
customer_reviews.text: I tried this for the first time in Sedona. I was thrilled when I found them on Amazon! They taste great and I love the sugar difference in the light version without adding any false sweeteners. I feel like they are pricey, but I pay it anyway because I love them .
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This is the Ginger Beer you've been looking for
customer_reviews.text: Amazing on its own or in a Moscow Mule. This is by far the best ginger beer I have ever tasted, and I've sampled more than a dozen looking for the perfect Mule. This has a very strong and spicy natural ginger flavor. They do not use chili or any other flavorings to make it spicy or fruity. It is pure ginger with its own naturally spicy bite. The best hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this tonic; I have tried a variety of tonics and this is by far the best and worth the extra cost, in fact I am having one with a lovely gin from the State of Maine right now (so please forgive any typographical errors in this review). Simply put this tonic has the best flavor an ingredients of any tonic I have tried, which gives it a great balance with anything that it is mixed with. I have had multiple people bulk at the price, but later ask me for the name again, they are all converts.
customer_reviews.author: T.G.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional!! Ordered again as a gift too.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the tastiest beverages I have ever had out of a bottle. Exceptional chilled. Would order again. Actually I have ordered it again. Ordered as a gift too! The receiver enjoyed it too and they want more.
customer_reviews.author: Babykohr

customer_reviews.title: High quality stuff. Doesn't get any better if you want natural flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Fever tree is the best ginger beer soda out there in my humble opinion. If you want natural flavor, that is. It's clean and it's strong. If you like the artificial flavor, and there is nothing wrong with that, and you like it strong, I suggest you try Goya. It's even more peppery than fever tree. This is excellent stuff in general but due to it's natural ginger content, it's especially useful to settle that queasy stomach. I recommend this product to my patients that need to deal with chemotherapy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lipp

customer_reviews.title: The best brand of ginger beer for moscow mules
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this refreshingly light ginger beer from the liquor store for months now (it tastes identical to the regular-calorie version in my opinion) but I decided to order from amazon to save money. Very glad I did, it ships quickly and arrives with no broken bottles - so convenient! Also any drinks made with this brand will taste 10x better than anything made with Gosling's ginger beer - especially the diet Gosling's which is disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA gin and tonic is only as good as the tonic you put in
customer_reviews.text: Makes cheap vodka tonics taste expensive, no squeeze of anything required and frankly the water if probably more costly than the vodka. BUT oh where oh have you been in my life, this stuff tastes like some kind of botanical grapefruit water, I have to hide if from the kids
customer_reviews.author: Mike Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger Beer!
customer_reviews.text: Packaging set the bar high, it was fantastic for glass. The taste is delicious! The bottles, however, are tiny. Purchased larger bottles at a better price at Costco.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Ginger flavor but tiny bottles!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious Ginger flavor with the right amount of Ginger snap to it! But beware they are being sold in insanely teeny tiny bottles (my mistake for not checking whether they were standard size soda bottles)--more like mini-bar size!
customer_reviews.author: HouseMaven

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, lo-cal and perfect size to make a moscow mule
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different Ginger Beers and by far this is the best tasting. Additionally, this size bottle is the perfect amount for 1 drink. In the past using larger bottles the Ginger Beer looses it's fizz after the first pouring..Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but too much breakage
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered this 3 times. The first order arrived just fine. The other 2 there was breakage.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: A Ginger who loves Ginger Beer not Tonic Water!
customer_reviews.text: I love their ginger beer it is definitely the best hands down. Unfortunately I didn’t receive ginger beer. Instead I received Indian tonic water which I have no use for. I wouldn’t write a review like this, but it’s the second time this has happened and I have two cases of tonic water. The first time they corrected the problem and sent me ginger beer. This time it’s not returnable and I don’t know what to do! I love their ginger beer and wish they could straighten this out.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Ward

customer_reviews.title: Was flat and fever tree isn’t cheap
customer_reviews.text: Was flat when I got it. 1st time. All of it
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: Love Fever Tree Ginger Beer as it makes my Moscow Mule a great cool summer drink. Other Ginger B eers in cans are too much for 1 drink and then go flat if you try to save it.
customer_reviews.author: Lazylucy

customer_reviews.title: Fever-Tree Premium Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: Best ginger beer ever. Great for mixed drinks or just as is. I mix with tonic water and add some lime and bitters (no liquor) with ice cubes and it’s delicious and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Zedalis

customer_reviews.title: The best ginger beer
customer_reviews.text: We are so addicted to this stuff! It tastes so good. My husband uses it as a cocktail mixer but I prefer it straight out of the bottle when it’s ice cold. We have tried many other brands of ginger beer and they don’t even compare to this.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a walking talking commercial for this product. Great, great ginger taste! A teeny bit pricey for the small bottles but excellent excellent flavor, so for me its worth it. If you like ginger beer, even though this is non-alcoholic, you will love this! I promise. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: simply put, the best
customer_reviews.text: wow. been loving great ginger beer for years. I sometimes find some I like and then can't find it again, but coming across fever tree, wow, these are crafted. Crispest, purest flavors I have ever tasted. This rivals ALL the house-made / home-made ones in the best cocktail places I go. I spoke to one bartender at a place where they pride themselves on making all their own mixers in house (which are fantastic), but he was like, oh yeah, everyone here likes the Fever Tree Ginger Beer the best. And they have a great ginger beer. It tastes of quality, awesome and ginger.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Very gingery!
customer_reviews.text: Originally recommended by a liquor store employee, this is the best ginger beer we have ever tasted. It's non-alcoholic, not too sweet, and impressively GINGER! Provided relief from a persistent stomach ache and made a great Dark & Stormy (with Cruzan Blackstrap rum& lime) once I was well.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest Joy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Just bought last week for 27.18 the case and went to purchase again and it's up over $10.00 !!!! DAMN, DAMN DAMN...Will go back to get it at a local supermarket where I'll get it cheaper even considering the ride there and back. Sorry for the 3 stars... that's for the $10 raise ... the product is awesome...
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ginger beer so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried mulitple brands of ginger beer over the last few months and can easily say that Fever-Tree is by far my favorite! It has an amazingly crisp, dry taste that will take most people by surprise and can almost over power you if drank straight. As a mixer it really shines and makes any cocktail asking for ginger beer better than before! I cannot say enough about how good this drink is and now I keep a few bottles in my fridge at all times. I suggest you try a few to find one that suits your taste but you really need to make sure this is one of the brands you try.
customer_reviews.author: Goat Rope Garage

customer_reviews.title: Best ginger beer on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I started drinking ginger beer when my mom had to buy it for me at the liquor story because no one else knew what it was. My mom also introduced me to Moscow Mule's too before they were popular. I actually discovered ginger beer from reading historical novels. Apparently ginger beer was like lemonade during the 1700s in England. I had to ask my mom what it was. Anyway, this is the best ginger beer on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Quarles

customer_reviews.title: This is what GINGER BEER is suppose to taste like
customer_reviews.text: I have drank ginger beer for years. Most of the stuff being sold for ginger beer relys on a high content of sugar and carbonation. That makes for a sugary drink Fever Tree brand is what good ginger beer tastes like Great taste, natural flavor with no carbonation and less sugar (20g) than most brands, allowing for a strong crisp naturlly ginger flavored drink. Superior in flavor to Barrs, and DG brands. The 16 ounce bottles are the perfect size. By comparison the rest are just overly sweetened ginger flavored sugar water. Always check the sugar content, anything over 30gs is too much sugar.
customer_reviews.author: Wave

customer_reviews.title: Only ginger beer worth drinking
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4-pack of this when in another country. Loved it - liquid ginger. Ordered a case from Amazon. Arrived well-packaged. Wonderful taste..
customer_reviews.author: Wunder One

customer_reviews.title: Strong Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine drinking this stuff straight but it's good for moscow mule's. I use half a bottle with each drink and then top of off with ginger ale to smooth it out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger Beer (in my opinion)
customer_reviews.text: Best Ginger Beer - ever. I've tried a lot of ginger beers; Barrett's, Gosling's, and others from all over the world. The Fever Tree Ginger Beer is the best tasting of them all. The zing at the end of each sip (either by itself, or in your Dark and Stormy, or Moscow Mule) is amazing. The carbonation is nice as well, and adds to the quality of your drink. There is a lower sugar version available (only in 16.9floz, not the 6.8floz), which has the same zing, but with lower sugar (only 48 calories per serving!)
customer_reviews.author: Roland Muts

customer_reviews.title: Really clean, delicious and has a great ginger bite
customer_reviews.text: Fever Tree and Fentiman's Ginger Beers are my favorites. I love that there is real ginger, spring water and cane sugar as minimal ingredients. Not only does this stuff taste great right out of the bottle, it's a wonderful mixer with rum, gin and vodka. Plus you get the added benefit of ginger's digestive perks. I drink ginger beer to calm an upset stomach and aid in digestion. I LOVE the real ginger bite too. I learned that ginger beer usually means real ginger and ginger ale is usually ginger flavored carbonated water. I will always choose the real ginger beer. I think this will be stocked in my fridge for long time.
customer_reviews.author: Par4dox

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLY THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Ginger Beers and this is absolutely the best that I have had. I like to taste the ginger and this one delivers but is not over powering...just the perfect amount. The others I have tried lose the zip of the ginger before I am finished with the drink. Fever-Tree is a must for a Moscow Mules. Mostly I drink this alone...it is so delicious!!!!
customer_reviews.author: beth haas

customer_reviews.title: Real Ginger Kick
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flavor and a real ginger kick. In fact, I have to sneeze when I sip it some times. This is for real ginger fans for sure! I bought the light version to save a few calories based on other reviews and was not disappointed. Very refreshing drink and not for the faint of heart!
customer_reviews.author: Nealio

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: We love this non-alcoholic Fever Tree Ginger Beer! We highly recommend it to those of us who like the taste of ginger. This is without a doubt the best one we've ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice G. Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Fever-Tree Ginger Beer
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed this product for over a year now. I tried it when I was visiting a friend in England. At first I didn't find it here in the USA but once I did I have ordered 2 cases of it each time. The taste has a real ginger kick to it and is very refreshing. If you love ginger or ginger ale then this is the product you need to try. No more "ginger ale" for me, I will only buy Fever-Tree Ginger Beer from now on. There is no alcohol in this product !! Kath - 7/15/2012  Amazons link to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A  Barber Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Bigger isn’t always better
customer_reviews.text: These held their ‘fizz’ if you didn’t use all of one. The flavor seems a little flatter than the smaller bottles, but still pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: What Ginger Beer was meant to be
customer_reviews.text: This is a bit on the expensive side (and is a smaller bottle), but it actually tastes really good. The larger bottle has a watered down version that tastes ok imho ** update. Still expensive, but compared to all the rest, this is the closest thing to pure ginger beer (plus sugar) I can find. They now have a larger bottle!! and they've created a "light" brand for the watered down (probably off the top of the still) version. It would be great if they added a subscribe and save option, but if they can keep up the quality I would be happy enough.
customer_reviews.author: XCalmiber

customer_reviews.title: Great Ginger Beer in hard to find US
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the package an hour ago! This is the ginger beer flavor I was looking for. After sampling Crabbie's ginger beers on a trip to London over the summer I've been searching for something comparable in the states. I finally saw Fever Tree Ginger beer on Amazon. I read the reviews and figured with prime shipping I would give it a try. It's delicious and has a strong ginger bite. You actually feel healthier after drinking it. I still prefer Crabbies which you can't get in the US, which is why the 4 stars, but love the Fever Tree Ginger Beer!
customer_reviews.author: Mayfair Delights

customer_reviews.title: Really good - still searching for perfect Mule partner
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent compromise for ginger beers - less sharp than Barrett's so other flavors can come through. Maybe not carbonated enough. But best so far I've found.
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Buy it Drink It Prof It
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for a competitor's product and found NUMEROUS reviews putting Fever-Tree's Ginger Beer up in the #1 spot. I was SO PLEASED with the results once my 8 bottles arrived that I put myself on a schedule of 1 bottle per week. It's a bit pricey but an indulgent treat and the balance of the flavor and carbonation is excellent. HANDS down the best ginger beer on the commercial market...don't delay in ordering you won't be let down.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Zawora

customer_reviews.title: The Brits Know Their Mixers
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a ginger beer to make a UK worthy Moscow Mule. I did a little research on best mixers. The Fever Tree Premium was number one and available on Amazon. It's spicy with a natural ginger taste. If it tastes a bit strong at first add more lime. You will crave this drink. It shipped quickly and is easily stored. Set out the bottles on your mixing station or bar for a decorative touch. I will buy this over and over.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Molder

customer_reviews.title: Real ginger in this drink !
customer_reviews.text: We love this ginger beer, strong, robust, real ginger used, quality product. Our only go to for ginger beer, it is the Best, and we have tried many ! However if you like a more diluted taste this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice ginger bite
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I have also tried the full sugar one as well and I don't see a difference. This has a nice ginger bite to it!
customer_reviews.author: Brianne Laxton

customer_reviews.title: GIN and Gingerbeer -- Had this in UK -- Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had this in UK -- Love it . Now I can have it dropped at front door! Cant get any better than this. This is perfect for hot days. 2 or 5 shots of GIN and one of these -- fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect mixer!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely LOVE this "refreshingly light" ginger beer! It has that sharp ginger flavor and less sugar but doesn't have that awful diet aftertaste. It's the perfect mixer.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Best for Mule
customer_reviews.text: Best for Mules. Used to buy at the grocery store but popularity has been harder to find every time. Ordered it online and much more convenience. Packaging was great and delivered no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chase M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ginger Beer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly packed and arrived intact. I’ll definitely order from this company again. Now, I’m ready for a Moscow Mule!
customer_reviews.author: HouTXGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent taste
customer_reviews.text: The perfect amount of sugar, not too little, not too much. And the ginger is incredibly yummy. I drink them plain but of course they make an outstanding Moscow Mule.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow this is like the most delicious ginger ale I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow this is like the most delicious ginger ale I have ever had. I don't know the difference between ginger ale and ginger beer, probably sweetness, but I know these are awesome. Screw top, and stores in fridge fine for a couple of days if you don't finish it in one sit down (pretty big bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Markland

product_meta.title: Fever-Tree Premium Ginger Beer - 500mL Bottles, Pack of 8 - Premium Cocktail Drink Mixer - Made With Natural Flavors and No Artificial Sweeteners or Preservatives
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Original| Size:16.9 Fl Oz (Pack of 8)A distinct, fresh ginger taste predominates. It is refreshing and clean-tasting without being overly sweet. As the liquid passes through the palate, the ginger will fill the whole mouth, leaving a warmth at the back of the throat. To achieve the fiery, full-bodied taste of our Ginger Beer, we selected three types of ginger for their complementary, yet distinctive, flavor profiles. From Cochin in India, we source a variety that lends a rich and earthy, almost chocolatey, flavor. From the Ivory Coast, we get a fresh green ginger that has an incredible lemongrass freshness. Finally, our Nigerian ginger brings a deep, intense flavor to the blend. As well as pressing the plant to extract the oils, we macerate the roots and steep them to release the stronger, more typical ginger flavors.
feature_bullets: QUALITY INGREDIENTS: By brewing a blend of three gingers from Nigeria, Cochin and the Ivory Coast, we have created an award-winning ginger beer that has been highly acclaimed by gastronomes and critics alike

FLAVOR: Not too sweet on the palate and with a deep long-lasting ginger character. As the liquid passes through the palate the ginger will fill the whole mouth, leaving a warmth at the back of the throat
NATURALLY SOURCED: Made with three types of ginger, Fever-Tree Ginger Beer has the aroma of freshly grated ginger. Our Ginger-Beer has no artificial sweeteners, flavorings or preservatives
PREMIUM MIXER: Perfectly balanced to be mixed with the finest spirits or equally delicious as a sophisticated soft drink on its own
TEXTURE: A smooth, silky texture created by the small, perfectly formed bubbles and ingredients
